Text: cool release man . hope its a nice animation movie . keep up ur fantabulous work sir . ur number 1 .
thank you very much !! you are the best !

i was watching the movie . thr is some problem in the file . the sound just goes off many times .like at 00:08:30 just after the word opposites .

video breaks for a sec n bcm normal but sound misses . it happen 3-4 times .

@htctouch: Sorry to inform you, but there is nothing wrong with file I have.
I have watched exact same place you have described - and found funny little banana-like fellow saying "... opposite" and whole crowd laughed on that...
Further, there are no "glitches" or "jerkiness" of any kind, both video and audio.
I tip on some background process on your PC (like anti-virus popped-in in some scheduled task or something similar).
And please - I do understand your troubles with English (as I have them all the time) but - try to say MY COPY has problems or MY PC has problems - not as you just did.
People are paranoid enough to "misread" your writing - and people do not look for the problems in their own backyard first - then tell to the world...
